biography: Urara Takano (高乃 麗, Takano Urara, August 16, 1961) is a Japanese voice actress and narrator from Togane City, Chiba Prefecture. She also runs the talent agency Remax. Previously, she was attached to theater company Bungakuza and talent agency Ken Production. Her real name and former stage name is Hisako Takayama (高山 ひさ子, Takayama Hisako). Actress Anna Kirie (桐江 杏奈, Kirie Anna) is her daughter.
name: Urara Takano
